source.inline: if application "Safari" is running then	tell application "Safari"		repeat with t in tabs of windows			tell t				if URL starts with "https://music.yandex.ru" and name does not end with "на Яндекс.Музыке" then					return name of t as text				end if			end tell		end repeat	end tellend ifreturn ""

actionAppleScript.inline: if application "Safari" is running then	tell application "Safari"		repeat with w in windows			repeat with t in tabs of w				tell t					if URL starts with "https://music.yandex.ru" and name does not end with "на Яндекс.Музыке" then --последнее условие проверяет, запущена ли музыка						activate						set index of w to 1						delay 0.1						set current tab of w to t					end if				end tell			end repeat		end repeat	end tellend if

source.inline: tell application "Reminders"	set activeReminders to name of (reminders of list "Напоминания" whose completed is false)	if activeReminders is not {} then		return first item of activeReminders	else		return ""	end ifend tell

if application "iTunes" is running then	tell application "iTunes"		if player state is not stopped then return ""	end tellend ifif application "Safari" is running then	tell application "Safari"		repeat with t in tabs of windows			tell t				if URL starts with "https://music.yandex.ru" and name does not end with "на Яндекс.Музыке" then					return ""				end if			end tell		end repeat	end tellend ifreturn "▶"
